metadata.label: COPD - Null Scenario
metadata.description:
Scenario with all interventions scaled to 0% coverage, representing no intervention implementation.
This null scenario sets target coverage to zero for all COPD-specific interventions: Inhaled Salbutamol, Ipratropium Inhaler, and Oral Prednisolone.
Also sets coverage to zero for all tobacco control interventions including protection policies, cessation programs, warning labels, mass media campaigns, and advertising bans.
This scenario serves as a counterfactual baseline to measure the full impact of intervention packages by comparing against a state with no interventions.
Useful for calculating total health gains, deaths averted, and disability-adjusted life years (DALYs) prevented when interventions are implemented from zero coverage.

Inhaled Salbutamol Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Inhaled Salbutamol Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Inhaled Salbutamol Scale-Up Start Year.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Inhaled Salbutamol Scale-Up Final Year.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Inhaled Salbutamol Population In Need.description: The proportion of persons who require the intervention

Inhaled Salbutamol Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention

Ipratropium Inhaler Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Ipratropium Inhaler Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Ipratropium Inhaler Scale-Up Start Year.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Ipratropium Inhaler Scale-Up Final Year.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Ipratropium Inhaler Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Scale-Up Start Year.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Oral Prednisolone Scale-Up Final Year.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Oral Prednisolone Population In Need.description: The proportion of persons who require the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention
